29328.name: Credit
29328.desc: This currency, used by the Interastral Peace Corporation to settle accounts with its customers, is now widely accepted as the hard currency for space travel.
29328.lore: "People run around fighting and trading for numbers in a terminal, but the truly precious cannot be bought."

125435.name: Tracks of Destiny
125435.lore: Your victory is secured by countless failures, and the small steps you have taken led you to the turning point of fate.

151162.name: Nail of the Beast Coffin
151162.desc: A section of a mech's bionic spinal column. Can be used for the Ascension of Lightning characters.
151162.lore:
The most important central component of the mech that was built in imitation of the borisin. Though the body that nurtured it no longer has even a sliver of life left, this component still maintains the "Slaughter Algorithm" inherited from primordial days and buried deep within its genes.

"While you see a monster that can never be killed, I see infinite parts to salvage. That's the difference in perspective."

409960.name: Traveler's Guide
409960.desc: Experience material for characters. Provides <nobr>20,000</nobr> Character EXP.
409960.lore:
Required reading for world exploration. Press the "Read" button to tune in to an attractive voice in a language you understand, telling you about the legendary encounters of renowned adventurers across different worlds as well as the precious wisdom and knowledge that they have gathered.

"All-new series of the Traveler's Guide, The Chef's Manual to Galactic Cuisine, is now available for purchase."
"For submissions, please connect to synesthesia beacon ERD-23θ to contact an Intelligentsia Guild representative. Method of payment can be arranged to your convenience."

409961.name: Adventure Log
409961.desc: Experience material for characters. Provides <nobr>5000</nobr> Character EXP.
409961.lore:
A neatly organized collection of educational adventure notes containing countless illustrations and texts entailing adventures from beginning to end, as well as valuable information and survival-related techniques.

"Why not just digitize it and save it on a photolith disk? That'd be much more convenient."
"Advanced technology is far more fragile than you'd think when faced with stellar storms and neuron flow eruptions. Besides, I'm sure the author of this book wanted people to read it in the simplest of ways."

409962.name: Travel Encounters
409962.desc: Experience material for characters. Provides <nobr>1000</nobr> Character EXP.
409962.lore:
A travel diary with messy handwriting and random content. It's not of much use to you.

"Dan Heng, hurry up and finish reading it so you can throw it away."

671367.name: Auspice Sliver
671367.lore:
Only in the fleeting moment right before death, when all things appear frozen in time, can the eyes of mortal humans behold the falling forms of these spiritual feathers. Flying Aureus, Spiritus — its speed is the greatest out of the seven forms of the Reignbow's manifestation.

"I spent a dozen days and nights to hunt it, only to discover it has always been inside my body."

6471577.name: Seedling of Manas
6471577.desc: Memory's cells extract thoughts, propagating in the heart of the inscriber. Used to level up Traces moderately for Remembrance characters.
6471577.lore:
The seeds take root and sprout. Branches and buds weave together, transmitting signals like a living network of synapses. Over the passage of years, some wither and fade, while others flourish, growing strong enough to bear life and form the vessel of a soul.

"We did not abandon the flesh. We merely transformed it into something... more enduring."

6720910.name: Flower of Ālaya
6720910.desc: This is another form for life to exist and a substance that the universe cannot forget. Used to level up Traces significantly for Remembrance characters.
6720910.lore:
It matures. It becomes a web that constrains history, a blossom from the past. Life is its flower bed or its pistil. If you become the pistil, then you remember the universe and the universe remembers you. You are memory.

"Memory is the true form of all things, thus there is no creation or annihilation in the Anāśrava pure land."

6744567.name: Bīja of Consciousness
6744567.desc: Consciousness fuses with matter, giving rise to the embryo of memory. Used to level up Traces slightly for Remembrance characters.
6744567.lore:
This thing does not truly exist until you see, hear, or sense something. This existence born from sensations soon falls silent, buried in the soil of thought — it may sprout one day, or it may not.

"Such is the substance that forms our bodies, existing because you remember."

20170864.name: Courage-Torn Chest
20170864.desc: A fragment of the Strife Titankins after their demise. Normal material used for enhancement.
20170864.lore:
The slothful generals began to drill, and the reclusive sages began to plot. Then humanity discovered they could shatter the creations of gods, and slaughter became war.

"Fear is the chisel of courage."
comeFrom: Titankin at Equilibrium Level 2 or higher

20389475.name: Glory-Aspersed Torso
20389475.desc: The heart of a Strife Titankin, full of divine power. Advanced material used for enhancement.
20389475.lore:
In the beginning, humanity fought wars to stay alive, but now some fight as fearlessly as the Titankins of Strife to achieve death. The Kremnoans say that perhaps warriors of flesh and stone share the same heart —

"And this heart is called glory, with courage flowing within."
comeFrom: Titankin at Equilibrium Level 4 or higher

20445700.name: Fear-Stomped Flesh
20445700.desc: Dust that forms the Strife Titankins. Crude material used for enhancement.
20445700.lore:
The tide of death sweeps across the world, and giants of hatred and resentment step forth from the River of Souls. All fear and cower before that stone-carved legion.

"Slaughter is the stone from which fear is hewn."

ranks.name: Drift at the Whim of Venus
ranks.descHash: Enemies afflicted with "Seam Stitch" take <nobr>#1[i]%</nobr> increased DMG. After Aglaea or Garmentmaker attacks this target, Aglaea additionally regenerates <nobr>#2[i]</nobr> Energy.

ranks.name: Sail on the Raft of Eyelids
ranks.descHash: When Aglaea or Garmentmaker takes action, the DMG dealt by Aglaea and Garmentmaker ignores <nobr>#1[i]%</nobr> of the target's DEF. This effect stacks up to <nobr>#2[i]</nobr> time(s) and lasts until any unit, other than Aglaea or Garmentmaker, actively uses an ability.

ranks.name: Bequeath in the Coalescence of Dew
ranks.descHash: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <nobr>15</nobr>. Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. <nobr>10</nobr>. Memosprite Talent Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. <nobr>10</nobr>.

ranks.name: Flicker Below the Surface of Marble
ranks.descHash: The SPD Boost effect from the Memosprite Talent has its max stack limit increased by <nobr>#1[i]</nobr>. After Aglaea uses an attack, Garmentmaker can also gain the SPD Boost effect from the Memosprite Talent.

ranks.name: Weave Under the Shroud of Woe
ranks.descHash: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <nobr>15</nobr>. Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <nobr>15</nobr>. Memosprite Skill Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. <nobr>10</nobr>.

ranks.name: Fluctuate in the Tapestry of Fates
ranks.descHash: While Aglaea is in "Supreme Stance," increases her and Garmentmaker's Lightning <u>RES PEN</u> by <nobr>#1[i]%</nobr>. When Aglaea or Garmentmaker's SPD is greater than <nobr>160</nobr>/<nobr>240</nobr>/<nobr>320</nobr>, the DMG dealt by <u>Joint ATK</u> increases by <nobr>#2[i]%</nobr>/<nobr>#3[i]%</nobr>/<nobr>#4[i]%</nobr>.

skills.descHash: Deals Lightning DMG equal to #1[i]% of Aglaea's ATK to one designated enemy.
skills.name: Thorned Nectar

skills.descHash: Restores HP to Garmentmaker by #1[i]% of its Max HP. If Garmentmaker is absent, summons the memosprite Garmentmaker and this unit immediately takes action.
skills.name: Rise, Exalted Renown

skills.descHash:
Summons the memosprite Garmentmaker. If Garmentmaker is already on the field, then restores its HP to max. Aglaea enters the "Supreme Stance" state and immediately takes action.
While in the "Supreme Stance" state, Aglaea gains the SPD Boost stacks from Garmentmaker's Memosprite Talent, with each stack increasing her SPD by #1[f1]%. Enhances Basic ATK to "Slash by a Thousandfold Kiss," and cannot use Skill. Garmentmaker is immune to Crowd Control debuffs.
A countdown appears on the Action Order, with its own SPD set at #4[i]. Using Ultimate again when the countdown is on the Action Order will reset the countdown. When the countdown's turn starts, Garmentmaker self-destructs. When Garmentmaker disappears, Aglaea's "Supreme Stance" state is dispelled.
skills.name: Dance, <nobr>Destined Weaveress</nobr>

skills.descHash: The memosprite Garmentmaker has an initial SPD equal to #4[i]% of Aglaea's SPD and a Max HP equal to #5[i]% of Aglaea's Max HP plus #6[i]. While Garmentmaker is on the field, Aglaea's attacks inflict the target with the "Seam Stitch" state. After attacking enemies in the "Seam Stitch" state, further deals Lightning Additional DMG equal to #1[i]% of Aglaea's ATK. "Seam Stitch" only takes effect on the most recently inflicted target.
skills.name: Rosy-Fingered

skills.descHash: Attacks an enemy, and when the battle starts, reduces their Toughness of the corresponding Type.
skills.name: Attack

skills.descHash: Summons the memosprite Garmentmaker and launches a forward joint attack. After entering battle, regenerates #2[i] Energy and deals Lightning DMG equal to #1[i]% of Aglaea's ATK to all enemy targets. Then, randomly inflicts the "Seam Stitch" state to a random enemy target.
skills.name: Meteoric Sunder

skills.descHash:
Aglaea and Garmentmaker launch a Joint ATK on the target, respectively dealing Lightning DMG equal to #1[f1]% of Aglaea's ATK and #3[f1]% of Garmentmaker's ATK to the target. Also, deal Lightning DMG equal to #2[i]% of Aglaea's ATK and #4[i]% of Garmentmaker's ATK to adjacent targets.
"Slash by a Thousandfold Kiss" cannot recover Skill Points.
skills.name: Slash by a Thousandfold Kiss

embedBonusSkill.descHash: While in "Supreme Stance," increases Aglaea and Garmentmaker's ATK by an amount equal to <nobr>#1[i]%</nobr> of Aglaea's SPD plus <nobr>#2[i]%</nobr> of Garmentmaker's SPD.
embedBonusSkill.name: The Myopic's Doom

embedBonusSkill.descHash: When Garmentmaker disappears, up to <nobr>#1[i]</nobr> stack(s) of the SPD Boost from the Memosprite Talent can be retained. When Garmentmaker is summoned again, gains the corresponding number of SPD Boost stacks.
embedBonusSkill.name: Last Thread of Fate

embedBonusSkill.descHash: At the start of battle, if this unit's Energy is lower than <nobr>#1[i]%</nobr>, regenerates this unit's Energy until <nobr>#2[i]%</nobr>.
embedBonusSkill.name: The Speeding Sol

voiceItems.title: First Meeting
voiceItems.text: O, noble guest from afar. The wind brought me news of you along the golden threads. My name is Aglaea, the Dressmaster of Okhema and one of Amphoreus's Chrysos Heirs. I hope we treat each other with honesty.

voiceItems.title: Greeting
voiceItems.text: Has your time in Okhema been enjoyable? If you have any wishes, please let this "Garmentmaker" know. The holy city will certainly offer the most splendid hospitality for its allies.

voiceItems.title: Parting
voiceItems.text: We will meet again, friend. No matter where your journey leads, the gates of Okhema will forever be open to heroes.

voiceItems.title: About Self: Identity
voiceItems.text: The world is almost destroyed after the Chrysos War, and now Okhema alone remains as the sole city of humanity. My duty is to protect this remaining haven... At any cost.

voiceItems.title: Chat: Dressmaking
voiceItems.text: Mnestia granted this world thousands of romances, and dressmaking is my favorite. Threads and fabric shimmer through my fingers, like how the fates of all living things become connected and woven into being.

voiceItems.title: Hobbies
voiceItems.text: Clothes are the barriers between bodies and hearts. Removing clothes would also remove such hindrances. You and I will lower our barriers to each other in the holy baths, like how the waters that trickle along our fingers intertwine and flow toward the future.

voiceItems.title: Annoyances
voiceItems.text: The joy of listening to birdsongs, the delight of breathing leafy scents, the touch of gentle water... The more I adore the happiness of this world, the more I fear these sights will be reduced to echoes of the past, only able to be replayed at the tips of my fingers.

voiceItems.title: Something to Share
voiceItems.text: When I was still a dressmaster, my job was already to break the ancient molds of fashion. Now, as a Chrysos Heir, I also have the responsibility to remove old wrongs and create brand-new "beauty."

voiceItems.title: Knowledge
voiceItems.text: Poetry, sports, theater, sculpture... All things are the manifestation of beauty and have nurtured the souls of Okhema's people for millennia. People will sing in the baths even if faced with the end of the world — That's the life we live.

voiceItems.title: About Tribbie, Trianne, and Trinnon
voiceItems.text: Many people born in this era view faith as the only thing in their lives, and the prophecies of the three are able to soothe this anxious and restless world like a gentle rain.

voiceItems.title: About Phainon
voiceItems.text: Accepting others' wishes and turning them into his own wishes — not all heroes are such blank canvases as him, and that is why the world places such great hopes on him.

voiceItems.title: About Mydei
voiceItems.text: He's like a furnace, always lit with bottomless fire. This fire will either completely be doused in a storm, or melt down his own existence with it.

voiceItems.title: About Castorice
voiceItems.text: The one closest to death often knows the most about how precious life is. Her embrace brings eternal sleep, but such farewells are always warm.

voiceItems.title: Eidolon Activation
voiceItems.text: You cannot douse fire, for its inheritance will never be extinguished.

voiceItems.title: Character Ascension
voiceItems.text: Even the most majestic epics are woven from individual words.

voiceItems.title: Max Level Reached
voiceItems.text: Why does my passionate heart beat so?

voiceItems.title: Trace Activation
voiceItems.text: May we all emerge from this endless journey intact.

voiceItems.title: Added to Team With Trailblazer
voiceItems.text: Let us weave the future together.

voiceItems.title: Battle Begins: Weakness Break
voiceItems.text: Being direct is always preferable.

voiceItems.title: Battle Begins: Danger Alert
voiceItems.text: A bit too much commotion for my taste.

voiceItems.title: Turn Begins 1
voiceItems.text: Is that fear I sense? Your breathing is erratic.

voiceItems.title: Turn Begins 2
voiceItems.text: A little honesty would do us both some good.

voiceItems.title: Turn Idling
voiceItems.text: Find stillness, and enlightenment will emerge.

voiceItems.title: Basic ATK
voiceItems.text: Just a facade.

voiceItems.title: Basic ATK: Joint ATK 1
voiceItems.text: All lies shall be revealed with perfect clarity.

voiceItems.title: Basic ATK: Joint ATK 2
voiceItems.text: Life, so fragile, like a wisp of silk.

voiceItems.title: Skill: Summon Garmentmaker 1
voiceItems.text: Time for resolution.

voiceItems.title: Skill: Summon Garmentmaker 2
voiceItems.text: Care to dance?

voiceItems.title: Skill: Heal Garmentmaker 1
voiceItems.text: Bathe in gold.

voiceItems.title: Skill: Heal Garmentmaker 2
voiceItems.text: Adorned in splendor.

voiceItems.title: Hit by Light Attack
voiceItems.text: Of no great concern.

voiceItems.title: Hit by Heavy Attack
voiceItems.text: The way is fraught with difficulties.

voiceItems.title: Ultimate: Activate
voiceItems.text: Countless threads, all within my grasp.

voiceItems.title: Ultimate: Unleash
voiceItems.text: Thus, your fate and mine become one.

voiceItems.title: Downed
voiceItems.text: Bound... by the threads of demise...

voiceItems.title: Return to Battle
voiceItems.text: It appears the end is not yet at hand.

voiceItems.title: Health Recovery
voiceItems.text: Thank you, friend.

voiceItems.title: Technique
voiceItems.text: Cut away the heart of strife.

voiceItems.title: Battle Won
voiceItems.text: The foretold triumph draws nearer.

voiceItems.title: Treasure Opening 1
voiceItems.text: A gentle texture, and of fine craftsmanship.

voiceItems.title: Treasure Opening 2
voiceItems.text: An abundant fragrance, worthy of recognition.

voiceItems.title: Precious Treasure Opening
voiceItems.text: Happenstance and surprise, both laced with beauty.

voiceItems.title: Successful Puzzle-Solving 1
voiceItems.text: Intricate weaving, nothing left to chance.

voiceItems.title: Successful Puzzle-Solving 2
voiceItems.text: An inventive approach, truly unique.

voiceItems.title: Enemy Target Found
voiceItems.text: In tight confines, a clash of wills is unavoidable.

voiceItems.title: Returning to Town
voiceItems.text: Should you have a moment, take some time for a bath.

storyItems.title: Character Details
storyItems.text:
In that holy city kissed by the dawn, the weaver caresses the golden thread and connects destiny.
Chrysos Heir bearing the Coreflame of "Romance"... You shall summon the heroes of this world, and lead them to once again embark on an endless journey
— Where they will smite down the gods, return the divine fire, and grant rebirth to the dying land of Amphoreus.

storyItems.title: Character Story: Part I
storyItems.text:
Years later, when she unexpectedly discovers a garment she had woven in her youth, tenderness pours from the silk, gently shaking her long-stilled heart.

In the family devoted to Mnestia throughout the generations, each member is taught a "beautiful" art from a young age. Portraits of the great masters hang on the honor wall of the private bath, ever watching over their progeny.
While many are left speechless by the intense scrutiny of these masters, she moves with an effortless grace beneath their heavy gaze.
"Painting succumbs to pretense, music to abstraction, sculpture to bulkiness, and drama to the mundane..."
The elders show clear signs of defeat, but her voice, young and resolute, silences any objections.
"Little Agy, surely there is nothing more beautiful than these."
Stepping out of the bath, she dances on tiptoes to the mirror, her pale golden hair cascading like a waterfall.
"No."
In the steam-clouded mirror, her golden eyes pull countless strands of attention along —
"I will find it — the existence that surpasses all others in beauty."

"It was for such a simple reason that, later on..." The warmth of the garment touches her fingertips, awakening memories.
She mischievously climbs in the Grove and mused in the baths, all for a golden leaf, a handful of inspirational spray.
She dashed across rooftops and paused in meadows, all to weave the freedom of the breeze and the far-off fragrance of flowers into her threads.
Time flowed on. The loom never stilled. Her creations spark trends in Okhema, again and again.
Dressed in her finest fabric, she visits the temple, yet she still wonders, "Is this beauty?"

The priest of Mnestia had reached her twilight years, her eyesight diminished, yet the girl's brilliance still cut through the gloom before her.

"Little Agy, when you assume the mantle of the 'Goldweaver,' you're destined to craft works that even the gods would envy."
"This garment, and you in this garment, are indeed beautiful... yet this isn't 'beauty'."
"But... aren't 'beauty' and 'beautiful' the same?"
"You still don't understand... and not understanding, that's a good thing, truly a good thing..."

storyItems.title: Character Story: Part II
storyItems.text:
As time swept by, the garments she designed multiply, as vast as the starry heavens.
Yet, curiously, within that grand and ornate wardrobe, many tattered old fabric scraps are carefully preserved.

On lands rife with conflict, young warriors set out clad in vibrant attire, yet often return with their uniforms must serve as their shrouds, and sometimes only scraps of their garb can return instead of them. When no one claimed these remnants, she alone collects them.
In her fury, she once destroyed lavish garments. The corrupt, pampered nobles did not deserve to parade in the clothing she crafted — even though she herself had once walked among them.
And then... there are those little garments, one after another...

Throughout the years, they grow up alongside her, sharing songs of past times and dreams of the future
— Only after witnessing so much ugliness does she understand the true weight of those innocent words.
"As a dressmaster of Okhema and priest of Mnestia, my duties align with yours."
"But the price of salvation..."
"...is it like yours?"
"Just like ours."

In the most visible spot, a simple, unadorned priest's robe hangs. She frequently takes it out to clean and dust, always reminding herself of the vow she made to the deity.
"Please forgive me, for the sake of the most beautiful creation in the world..."
Long ago, at the moment she took hold of the Coreflame, she suddenly "saw" in the darkness a breathtaking vista she had never before encountered —
In that golden future, there is no more strife, no more death.

storyItems.title: Character Story: Part III
storyItems.text:
They say it is the Flame-Chase Journey. They also say it is a journey of loss.

She can faintly feel something precious slipping away from her, but she has no time to dwell on it — for the person walking ahead of her is bearing a loss far greater than her own.
"I'll leave this place in your hands, Aglaea."
"Make sure you do your best."
"See you next time!"
She never understands why their goodbyes always sound like that.
All that remains are the faint melodies echoing from the depths of the sea, footprints swept away by the wind across the land, and an unsolvable chessboard left behind.

"How can delicate threads bear the heavy weight of fate?"
Her only companion is the Garmentmaker, yet her once grand wardrobe is now eerily empty.
The noble lady enters the political fray, sparking lively debates among the Council of Elders. Amid the continual sneers of bystanders, she begins to devise her plans.
The golden threads at her fingertips weave a net across Okhema. The nymphs rest in the corners of the city, ensnaring every whisper and breath.

Even the golden threads turn lethal, tainted with the scent of blood for the first time.

storyItems.title: Character Story: Part IV
storyItems.text:
To this day, the divine loom spins relentlessly, with numerous Garmentmakers hovering in midair. No one knows why they dance or why they rest.
"Garmentmaker, please head to the plaza. We have guests who have traveled from afar..."

This scene had unfolded countless times before. In the past, she was always the one reaching out, and now, it was others who sought her.
At that moment, a young man in silver-white armor stands there, his youthful face marred by hatred and bloodstains.
The girl in the purple dress remains silent, leaving a trail of chilling death mingled with the deep fragrance of flowers wherever she goes.
A thief, as stealthy as a cat, vanishes from Okhema, but she dismisses it as merely a silly prank.
The girl, warm as a faint light, had once healed her scars.
And then there is the crown prince from the outlands, the proud scholar —
"If one thread isn't enough, then let a myriad of threads lift the sky..."
She seeks out diverse threads of fate, intertwining them into a resilient net. This net would launch toward the Titans' Coreflames, rekindling it afresh in a new world.
"The Chrysos Heirs will together weave a dazzlingly bright future."

During a brief pause, she steps up to the window, overlooking the bustling city of Okhema below.
"Garmentmaker, brew me another cup of hot tea, please."
She shivers slightly, yet her heart is no longer stirred by the sorrows of the past.
Invisible golden threads spill from her fingertips, intertwining with the city-state's pulse and heartbeat, with the whisper of wind and patter of rain — all resonating under her touch, like inspiration conjured by the god of romance, pulsing with the promise of new life.
After deep thought, she carefully packs away the ornate garments she had crafted in her youth.
"Even if, in the end, I must wear nothing but plain clothes..."

Legend holds that every disciple of Mnestia devotes their entire life to crafting what they deem to be the Ultimate Beauty to present to their deity.
It's been a long time since she crafted beautiful garments.
Yet, she has never ceased weaving the threads of destiny.

skills.name: Thorned Snare
skills.skillDesc: Deals Lightning DMG equal to #1[i]% ATK to one enemy and Lightning DMG equal to #2[i]% ATK to adjacent targets.
skills.simpleSkillDesc: Deals minor Lightning DMG to one enemy target and adjacent targets.

skills.name: A Body Brewed by Tears
skills.skillDesc: After attacking an enemy afflicted with "Seam Stitch," increases this unit's SPD by #1[i], stacking up to #3[i] time(s). During Garmentmaker's turn, automatically uses "Thorned Snare," prioritizing enemies under the "Seam Stitch" state.
skills.simpleSkillDesc: After attacking an enemy afflicted with "Seam Stitch," increases this unit's SPD. During action, automatically uses attacks, prioritizing enemies under the "Seam Stitch" state.

skills.name: The Speeding Summer
skills.skillDesc: When Garmentmaker is summoned, this unit's <u>action advances</u> by <nobr>#1[i]%</nobr>.

skills.name: Bloom of Drying Grass
skills.skillDesc: When Garmentmaker disappears, regenerates <nobr>#1[i]</nobr> Energy for Aglaea.
skills.simpleSkillDesc: Regenerates Energy for Aglaea upon disappearing.

name: Aglaea
descHash: In that holy city kissed by the dawn, the weaver caresses the golden thread and connects destiny. Chrysos Heir bearing the Coreflame of "Romance"... You shall summon the heroes of this world, and lead them to once again embark on an endless journey — Where they will smite down the gods, return the divine fire, and grant rebirth to the dying land of Amphoreus.
